0.2.name: wordpress/wpbackbutton
0.2.description: wpbackbutton adds a "Back" button to your Wordpress blog which behaves like the javascript history.back() method. In contrast to history.back() it, of course, doesn't need Javascript & makes it possible to have a working 'Back' button even if the user comes to your blog via direct link (the "Back" button then redirects to the frontpage).
